verses.roman:
gopa-bālaka saba prabhuke dekhiyā
'hari' 'hari' bali' ḍāke ucca kariyā

synonyms: gopa-bālaka saba—all the cowherd boys; prabhuke dekhiyā—seeing the Lord; hari hari bali'-vibrating the sounds "Hari Hari"; ḍāke—shout; ucca kariyā—loudly.
translation: All the cowherd boys who saw Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu passing joined with Him and began to shout loudly, "Hari! Hari!"
